summary: You may think I'm making this up but..
body:
You may think I’m making this up but..

Last night I was thinking about a specific scene about the “book I’ll eventually write one day” and shuffling on Spotify looking for a good “first contact with music” song.

Acoustic Gerudo Valley, from the Legend of Zelda, came up and I was like “well, that’s a good song, I think I’m going with this one”.

But it doesn’t ended up in there, I started to listen the whole soundtrack from all games, and my god it’s so delightful, I listened it through the whole day.

At some point I thought: “I have to learn how to play Gerudo Valley”

So I stayed two and half hours learning how to play on my guitar, and eventually my fingers started to hurt because it’s been a really long time since I played for this long.

But I stopped?

No.

I grabbed my flute and started learning the ocarina songs.

One hour later I’ve learned them all and turned up my PC because now I have a decent PC and I can emulate Zelda Wind Waker, that’s a game I always start and have to stop because I don’t own the console.

Midway through the download I realized that I’ve never played the first Zelda game…

And now I’m sitting here, Wikia Zelda page open, about to put the forth download in the line because that’s what anxiety is.

summary: Now tell us about your thoughts on Ridley. :3
question: Now tell us about your thoughts on Ridley. :3
answer:
Ahh! Ridley! Certainly, I suppose I shall go on about him now. He and Colress are both tied for being my favorite character (mentioning that again because why not?)

Ridley honestly has my favorite chatacter designs out of any character i’ve ever seen. My personal favorite iterations of ridley are super ridley (super metroid), proteus ridley (samus returns), and the ridley clone (other m; yet I despise the game).

For me, I don’t even get upset for the fact that he appears in almost every game somehow. I just love seeing him take flight and come back to attempt to kill you. It makes for such an entertaining battle in my opinion!

He’s also my favorite villain, and is exactly what I would imagine a cold blooded nightmare would look like. A monstrously big dragon that keeps coming back no matter how many times you try to kill him. To make it even scarier, each time he comes back he is usually stronger than before. Plus he’s dubbed the “cunning god of death”. As if that wasn’t terrifying enough!

He has an interesting yet horrifying concept as well. Apparently when he kills something, they regrow his cells little by little. That’s why when we see proteus ridley, lots of his flesh returned and therefore he did not need his mechanical cyborg parts from metroid prime any longer.

There is so much more to like about this mysterious yet horrifying monster, but I suppose these are the main things I enjoy about the character.

Thank you for asking!

tags: this is supposed to be for kids
summary: i love kirby games games because they often start out with “kirby was hungry, and wished he had some delicious cake,” and end...
body: i love kirby games games because they often start out with “kirby was hungry, and wished he had some delicious cake,” and end with “fortunately, kirby was able to seal the eldritch god in the dark realm of the unseeing one, and peace returned to the mortal world,” and i don’t always spot the turn.

reblog.comment: i love kirby games games because they often start out with “kirby was hungry, and wished he had some delicious cake,” and end with “fortunately, kirby was able to seal the eldritch god in the dark realm of the unseeing one, and peace returned to the mortal world,” and i don’t always spot the turn.

trail.content_raw: i love kirby games games because they often start out with “kirby was hungry, and wished he had some delicious cake,” and end with “fortunately, kirby was able to seal the eldritch god in the dark realm of the unseeing one, and peace returned to the mortal world,” and i don’t always spot the turn.
trail.content: i love kirby games games because they often start out with “kirby was hungry, and wished he had some delicious cake,” and end with “fortunately, kirby was able to seal the eldritch god in the dark realm of the unseeing one, and peace returned to the mortal world,” and i don’t always spot the turn.

summary: Roundup Of Today’s Pokemon Press Conference
title: Roundup Of Today’s Pokemon Press Conference
body:
Roundup of last night’s Pokemon press conference

TOKYO — May 28, 2019 — During a press conference in Tokyo today, Tsunekazu Ishihara, president and CEO of The Pokémon Company, presented a glimpse into how the globally popular Pokémon brand will continue to be a trendsetter in gaming. Mr. Ishihara unveiled a broad range of offerings including mobile games, apps, and innovative connected hardware to show the variety of new ways Pokémon Trainers…

View On WordPress

tags: FIFA 19 ya te permite jugar la final de la Copa Mundial Femenil
summary: FIFA 19 ya te permite jugar la final de la Copa Mundial Femenil
title: FIFA 19 ya te permite jugar la final de la Copa Mundial Femenil
body:
A partir de hoy, los fans de FIFA 19 podrán jugar la final de la Copa Mundial Femenil con su equipo favorito gracias a una actualización gratuita que tendrá el juego. Los aficionados de FIFA tendrán la oportunidad de jugar en el Estadio de Lyon que cuenta con los auténticos uniformes de la selección nacional […]

La entrada FIFA 19 ya te permite jugar la final de la Copa Mundial Femenil aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..

summary: DETECTIVE PIKACHU LLEGARÁ A NINTENDO SWITCH #Juegos #Nintendo #DETECTIVEPIKACHU #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos...
title: DETECTIVE PIKACHU LLEGARÁ A NINTENDO SWITCH #Juegos #Nintendo #DETECTIVEPIKACHU #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias
body:
The Pokémon Company anunció que el juego Detective Pikachu, será lanzado para el Nintendo Switch.

Esta nueva versión tendrá un final diferente, pero no especifica si el juego será diferente en otra manera o si será una actualización del juego original. Solamente se menciona que el final será diferente al que se muestra en la película de Warner Bros. y Legendary.

[youtube=https://www.youtube.com…

View On WordPress

External image

The Pokémon Company anunció que el juego Detective Pikachu, será lanzado para el Nintendo Switch.

External image

Esta nueva versión tendrá un final diferente, pero no especifica si el juego será diferente en otra manera o si será una actualización del juego original. Solamente se menciona que el final será diferente al que se muestra en la película de Warner Bros. y Legendary.
